DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Visceral fat area criterion assess initial screening could predict response ovulation induction clomiphene citrate ( CC ) patient polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Predictors Ovarian Response During Clomiphene Citrate Ovulation Induction Patients With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The study carry 150 patient PCOS . Initial CC dose 50 mg daily 5 day start cycle day 3 . In case absent response , dos increase 100 150 mg daily subsequent cycle . First ovulation CC use end point.Statistical method Distribution characteristic patient present mean Â± SD . We use Mann-Whitney U test exploratory comparison initial parameter responder nonresponders . The univariate multivariate relation response CC assess use logistic regression analysis . Backward stepwise elimination use multivariate logistic analysis prediction patient CRA , P < 0.10 use cut-off level elimination non-significant predictor prognostic model . The area receiver operate characteristic ( ROC ) curve ( AUC ) use assess discriminative ability logistic model . SPSS statistical package version 17 ( SPSS Inc. , Chicago , IL ) MedCalc Software version 12.4 , ( Ostend , Belgium ) employ data analysis .
DOC.criteria: The study include 150 infertile woman ( age 18 40 year ) PCOS diagnose presence least two follow [ 15 ] : 1 . Clinical hyperandrogenism : Hirsutism acne vulgaris and/or biochemical hyperandrogenism ( total testosterone > 88 ng/dl DHEAS > 275 ug/dL ) [ 16 ] . ( 2 ) Menstrual and/or ovulatory disturbance , mainly oligomenorrhea ( interval vaginal bleeding > 35 day < 6 month ) amenorrhea ( bleed interval > 6 month ) . ( 3 ) Polycystic ovary visualize transvaginal ultrasound ( either 12 follicle measure 29 mm diameter increase ovarian volume > 10 cm3 ) . Patients one criterion exclude ; Age < 18 year > 40 year , body mass index ( BMI ) < 18.5 kg/m2 > 35 kg/m2 , pregnancy , endocrine disorder , systemic disease , current previous ( within last 3 month ) use oral contraceptive , glucocorticoid , antiandrogens , ovulation induction dopaminergic agent , use antidiabetes , antiobesity drug history tubal ovarian surgery .
